text: allāh hā avasan dinaya viśvāsa karana pirisak allāhṭa hā ohugē dūtayāṇanṭa viruddha vūvan haṭa priya karanu num̆ba nodakinu æta. ovuhu ovungē piyavarun hō ovungē daruvan hō ovungē sahōdarayin hō ovungē pavulē gnātīn vuvada. ovungē hadavat tuḷa ohu dēva viśvāsaya niyama koṭa ohugen vū ātmayen ovun śaktimat kaḷa aya ovuhu veti. tavada ēvāṭa yaṭin gaṁgāvan galā basnā (svarga) uyan valaṭa ohu ovun ætuḷu karayi. ehi ovun sadātanikayinya. allāh ovun gæna tṛptimat viya. ovuhu da ohu gæna tṛptimat vūha. allāhgē pirisa ovuhuya. dæna ganu. niyata vaśayenma allāhgē pirisa vana ovuhumaya jayagrāhakayō
